pvz.unit

Class GeneratorPlant

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • pvz.level.SerializableObservable
        • pvz.unit.Unit
          • pvz.unit.PerishableUnit
            • pvz.unit.Plant
              • pvz.unit.GeneratorPlant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SunflowerPlant

    public abstract class GeneratorPlant
extends Plant
    Abstract super class for plants that generate sun for the Field they are on. Concrete classes of Plant should be instantiated using PlantFactory.makePlant(pvz.unit.Plant.Type, pvz.level.Square).
    See Also:
